feed.title: Password Pusher Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.46.3: Framework Security Patch
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

  • Framework Security Patch (#2639) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.47.0: New Background Worker Dashboard (Admin)
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

This release bundles a new dashboard for background job monitoring for those running the pglombardo/pwpush-worker container. (Still in Beta).

Available from /admin and directly at /admin/jobs

  • New Background worker Dashboard (Admin) (#2638) @pglombardo
  • Add missing translation keys (#2649) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Latest Language Strings (#2648) @pglombardo
  • Remove the Feedback Form (#2640) @pglombardo

:arrow_up: Dependencies updates

  • :arrow_up: Bump standard from 1.41.0 to 1.41.1 (#2645) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump erb_lint from 0.6.0 to 0.7.0 (#2641) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump net-imap from 0.4.17 to 0.5.0 (#2643) @dependabot
  • :arrow_up: Bump aws-sdk-s3 from 1.167.0 to 1.168.0 (#2642) @dependabot

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@dependabot, @dependabot[bot] and @pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.46.4

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.47.1: Disable Secret URL Prefetch & Increased Security Logins
entry.content:
This release improves the security of logins. Details in #2651.

Thanks the security firm who pointed out these potential issues.

If I get permission, I'll post their details once all the fixes out. (There are more on the way)

:memo: What’s Changed

  • Disable prefetch on secret URLs (#2650) @pglombardo

:rocket: Features

  • Enable increased login security (#2651) @pglombardo

:busts_in_silhouette: List of contributors

@pglombardo

:motor_boat: Docker Images

Available on Docker Hub: https://hub.docker.com/r/pglombardo/pwpush

:running_man: Run This Version

bash docker run -d -p 5100:5100 pglombardo/pwpush:1.47.1

..and go to http://localhost:5100

entry.title: New release for Password Pusher: v1.47.2: New Admin Menu Item, Dependency & Security Updates
entry.content:
:memo: What’s Changed

:rocket: Features

  • Framework Update in 9b9f4e65edeb322a680279fe72c4884f6f50036c
  • Admin: Add admin dashboard to account menu (#2661) @pglombardo
